EmailTemplate.description: Email template to notify end user about his App status when location changes
EmailTemplate.name: IAM_LocationChange_App_Deactivate
EmailTemplate.subject: Cummins Online Account Location Updated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cummins
The location of your Cummins Online Account for {!Receiving_User.Username} has been updated. Due to this action, all original application access has been revoked and application access at your new location will be granted. If you do not regain all expected application access, please contact your local administrator or Cummins Account Representative for further support.
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact 1-800-CUMMINSâ„¢ or your Cummins account representative. Thank you for your interest in Cummins.
Cummins https://cumminsengines.com/customer-care.aspx If you have trouble clicking on the button, please click here. This e-mail invitation is sent from Cummins.
